tuv.seg: Information for those affected by bereavement
Faisnéis dóibh siúd a ghoilleann méala
• Dealing with the deceased person's estate
• Déileáil le heastát an duine éagtha
The Citizens Information Board publishes the Information for those affected by bereavement (pdf)
D’fhoilsigh an Bord um Fhaisnéis do Shaoránaigh an treoir seo. Faisnéis dóibh siúd a ghoilleann méala (pdf)
The links on this page give further information on the topics covered in the leaflet
Tugann na nascanna ar an leathanach seo tuilleadh faisnéise ar na hábhair a chlúdaítear sa bhileog
There is a link for each term highlighted in bold in the leaflet
Ta nasc ar an leathanach le haghaidh gach téarma atá i gcló trom sa bhileog
The links are also in the same order as the terms in bold
Ta na nascanna san ord céanna leis na téarmaí atá i gcló trom
The headings used on this page are the same as the chapter headings in the leaflet
Is ionann na ceannteidil ar an leathanach seo agus ceannteidil na gcaibidlí sa bhileog
document.write("If you would like these links to remain available while you browse this website, you can 'pin' the checklist to the right-hand side of the website
